entries: Your relic conjures a guideway of magnets beneath you, creating a frictionless path for you to rush forward at high speeds. You {@action Stride} up to three times in a straight line. If you end your final {@action Stride} adjacent to an object or creature, you ram into it, dealing {@damage 1d12} bludgeoning damage for every 2 levels of the relic, with a basic Reflex save.
